forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
The afternoon sun casts a gentle glow over Downtown San Francisco, mingling with a fresh breeze that whispers through the streets. The temperature hovers around a cool 63 degrees, gradually sliding toward a comfortable 61 as the day unfurls. Though bright and cheerful at the moment, the marine layer lurks on the horizon, hinting at the evening’s arrival. The clouds will gather, cloaking the sky in a muted embrace, bringing the possibility of light drizzle—enough to add a touch of mystery, but not enough to dampen the spirit. A soft southwest wind dances through the city, its playful gusts reminding passersby that the quintessential San Francisco chill is never far away.

As twilight descends, a light jacket or sweater will be a welcome companion against the cool air. The evening calls for leisurely strolls along the waterfront or quiet conversations in cozy cafés, where warmth and good company can buoy the mood. A little drizzle may tiptoe through the night, but it will hardly be intrusive, creating an atmospheric backdrop perfect for reflective moments or intimate gatherings. Embrace the evolving landscape of this spirited city, where every turn offers promise, even as the clouds begin to gather.
